definition: to depict/to trace (a drawing)/to copy/to touch up

sentences.english: The twice part depicts the frontier fortress.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分是对边塞地区的描绘。

sentences.english: A small illustration of this is the experience of Richard Garriott.
sentences.chinese: 这副小小的插图描绘的正是理查德加雷特的亲身经历。

sentences.english: They are famous for the lifelike reality of their paintings.
sentences.chinese: 他们因对事物的描绘几乎接近真实而出名。

sentences.english: The painter depicted Napoleon at the Battle of Waterloo.
sentences.chinese: 画家描绘了滑铁卢战役中的拿破仑。

sentences.english: Ponson, distinguished for seascapes, took part in salons since 1861.
sentences.chinese: 彭松以描绘海景著称，1861年起在巴黎沙龙参展。

sentences.english: Yeats describes mankind's fleshly predicament as a soul fastened to a dying animal.
sentences.chinese: 描绘了当灵魂依附于濒死的动物时人类肉体的窘境。

sentences.english: Whole developing process of the intermittent chaos is described in more detail.
sentences.chinese: 本文较详细地描绘了阵发混沌发展的全过程。

sentences.english: The depictions of the two Zenos are similar; both were tall.
sentences.chinese: 对两个芝诺的描绘是相似的，他们都同样高大。
她的美丽超出了人力所能描绘的限度。

sentences.english: Cardboard boxes for the tenements, doors and windows painstankingly detailed with coloured pens.
sentences.chinese: 用水彩笔描绘的纸板箱是用来装公寓，大门和窗户的。

sentences.english: I was, though, completely unaware of the outrageous way the media portrays the Gypsy population.
sentences.chinese: 然而我完全不知道媒体对吉普赛人的无耻可恶的描绘。

sentences.english: Early paintings depict figures using outdoor furniture often resembling more natural rock formations.
sentences.chinese: 早期绘画中描绘的户外家俱多呈自然石形。

sentences.english: In the fractals pictured above, points that are very close together can be different colors.
sentences.chinese: 在以上不规则描绘里，必须接近的点可以是不同颜色。

sentences.english: One idea or proposal is often depicted as one of the only options or paths.
sentences.chinese: 一个想法或者提议经常被描绘为唯一的选择或者途径。

sentences.english: Attempts to paint the family as welfare scroungers have failed.
sentences.chinese: 把这个家庭的人描绘成福利敲诈者的企图已经失败了。

sentences.english: An artist's depiction of flying into this system is shown in the above video.
sentences.chinese: 上面的视频是一位艺术家描绘的飞入该星系的画面。

definition: to trace over/to take a copy (of a calligraphy, a painting etc)/(fig.) to describe/to portray
to draw the outline of/to outline/to sketch/to delineate contours of/to give a brief account of
brush stroke in Chinese painting and calligraphy/brushwork/style of drawing or writing
line drawing in traditional ink and brush style/simple and straightforward style of writing
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
